LANDING.ABOUT_DESC: The Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation for Charity and Humanitarian Work was established under the high directives of His Highness Sheikh Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla, Member of the Supreme Council, Ruler of Umm Al Quwain, through an Amiri Decree No. (7) of 2013. It was officially registered by Ministerial Decision No. (491) of 2013 as a public benefit private foundation headquartered in Umm Al Quwain. The Foundation's Board of Trustees was formed in accordance with the provisions of the law under Amiri Decree No. (3) of 2014, chaired by His Highness Sheikh Majid bin Saud Al Mualla.
LANDING.REQUEST_AID: The foundation provides a variety of assistance to individuals and families, aiming to improve the quality of life and meet the needs of the community.

GATES.FAST_DONATION_DESC: Quick Donation - Ongoing Charity - Water Supply
GATES.PROJECTS_DESC: Amer Project - Transportation - Volunteering - Used Clothes Collection - Preserve Blessings

TERMS_WELCOME: Welcome to the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation
TERMS_INTRO: We welcome visitors to the website of the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est., and we emphasize that you read the following terms of use carefully before entering the website, as they are terms and conditions that apply to you once you use the website.
TERMS_USAGE: Your use of this website and the materials and services available on or through it (collectively referred to as the “Website”) is subject to the terms and conditions (“Terms of Use”) in addition to the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Please read the Terms of Use carefully before entering the website, as your entry is considered your prior approval of these terms and conditions without regard to how to access the electronic portal of the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est. for Charitable Works.
TERMS_INTELLECTUAL: All intellectual property rights, printing and publishing of information and electronic portal marks are protected in accordance with the laws regulating this in the United Arab Emirates, and the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est. is the sole and exclusive owner thereof.
TERMS_NO_POST: No user has the right to publish any materials on the electronic portal of the website of the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est. by any user, and the user bears full responsibility for doing so.
TERMS_GOVERN: The terms of use for the electronic portal of the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation for Charitable and Humanitarian Works shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
TERMS_NO_VIRUS: The user agrees not to send by e-mail or download through the electronic services of the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation for Charitable and Humanitarian Works any software viruses or other with the intent to damage files, data, software, devices and server systems or communication equipment, or to use any content that he is not authorized to use in whole or in part, and that he does not have the right to publish or reproduce it, or that includes a violation or infringement of the intellectual property rights of others.
TERMS_NO_IMPERSONATE: The user agrees that he will not impersonate any person, or identify himself in a false manner when using the services of the electronic donation portal of the association, and he will not use another user's account unless authorized to do so by that user.
TERMS_NO_COPY: The user agrees that he will not use the electronic services of the association to make copies, reproduce, publish or sell the services in whole or in part for commercial purposes without written permission from the Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation for Charitable and Humanitarian Works. It will not use the services in a manner that violates any applicable national or international laws, or violates any Internet protocols.
TERMS_NO_FAULT: Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est. is not responsible for any technical malfunctions or malfunctions affecting equipment or software of any kind, or for loss or failure to secure a connection to the network, or incompleteness, error or delay in transmission, nor is it responsible for any direct or indirect damages due to visiting or using the portal or loss of services or loss of income or benefits caused by a virus that may infect computer equipment or smart devices used to access the portal.
TERMS_CANCEL: The association has the right to cancel, terminate or suspend access to use the portal and the website for any reason and without prior notice, whether by stating reasons for that or by reserving them in accordance with the principle of privacy and confidentiality.
TERMS_UPDATE: Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Est. reserves the right to update and change these terms and conditions at any time.

FOUNDATION_NAME: Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Charitable and Humanitarian Foundation
ABOUT_TITLE: About Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation
REQUEST_AID: The foundation provides a variety of assistance to individuals and families, aiming to improve the quality of life and meet the needs of the community.
DONATION_MISSION: The Foundation strives to collect donations through several innovative and effective methods to ensure achieving charitable goals. The Foundation believes that every donation, no matter its value, makes a difference. We value your support and contributions in achieving our vision.
HALL_RESERVATION_DESC: The hall reservation service for weddings offers competitive prices, making the costs of the hall lower compared to other options. This helps young people reduce the financial burdens associated with wedding celebrations. Reservations can be made easily through the website.
MAJLIS_DESC: It can be used during condolences or seminars and is a free service aimed at reviving the heritage of the UAE and strengthening social ties. These Majlis provide a platform for sharing condolences and ideas, contributing to the enhancement of cultural values and Emirati traditions.
REQUEST_SENT_SUCCESS: The request has been successfully sent

FOOD_SAVING_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION: This program focuses on reducing food waste by collecting surplus meals and distributing them to those in need. It helps raise awareness about the importance of not wasting food resources.
TRANSPORT_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION: This program aims to provide transportation for patients who need to go to the hospital for their medical appointments. It helps facilitate access to healthcare, especially for those without means of transport.
RAMADAN_MEALS_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION: This program offers Iftar meals to those in need during Ramadan. It fosters a spirit of cooperation and participation during the holy month, ensuring everyone can break their fast properly.
STUDENT_TRANSPORT_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION: This program aims to facilitate student transportation to Zayed University, helping them access higher education without hassle. It is a significant support for students in their educational journey.
DECLARATION_DETAILS: I declare that all the provided data is correct

DRAG_DROP_FILE: Drag & drop your files here or browse
USED_CLOTHING_DISTRIBUTION_DESC: We work on collecting and distributing used clothes in good condition to help those in need and achieve the principle of social solidarity. This initiative aims to assist low-income families and make the most of available resources by recycling and reusing clothing. We believe in the importance of supporting our community and fostering a spirit of cooperation and solidarity among its members.

COLLECTION_USE_TITLE: Collection and Use of Electronic Information
SERVER_CAPTURES_IP: Our server automatically captures your IP address when you visit the portal.
IP_ADDRESS_DESC_1: Is the number assigned to the computer you are using.
IP_ADDRESS_DESC_2: Allows devices connected to the internet to determine the destination of outgoing data.
IP_USAGE_DESC_2: Assists in statistical analysis to measure portal usage.
IP_USAGE_DESC_3: Is not shared outside the technical team of Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla Foundation.
COOKIES_USAGE_DESC: Some sections of this portal use cookies to enhance interaction with your browser.
COOKIE_DESC_1: Is a small text file sent to your hard drive.
COOKIE_DESC_2: Allows our server to recognize your computer.
COOKIE_PRIVACY_DESC_1: The cookie will not attempt to read information from your hard drive.
COOKIE_PRIVACY_DESC_2: Information from cookies is not combined with personal data.
SECURE_TRANSMISSION_DESC: This portal has security measures to protect the information you provide.
PERSONAL_INFO_DESC_1: Your personal information will only be accessible to site employees who need it.
PERSONAL_INFO_DESC_2: It will not be available to the public without your consent.
PERSONAL_INFO_DESC_3: It will not be shared, exchanged, or sold without your prior consent.
PERSONAL_INFO_DESC_4: Access will be limited to qualified professionals providing services.
USER_RIGHTS_TITLE: Right to Review, Modify, or Correct Personal Data
USER_RIGHTS_DESC: Any user providing personal information has the right to review, modify, or correct their data.
